graph_title: Percentage of people from the university community who use the sports facilities and/or enrol in physical activities offered by the university

SDG_GOAL: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

indicator_level: Result (offer information on compliance with the SDG objectives at the UPO level)
